import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import CardTable from '../card-table/CardTable' import MainPage from '../main-page/MainPage' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Store from '../redux/Store' class Home extends Component { getWinnerName(){ var winners = Store.getState().cardTable.winners var winnerName = '' for(var i = 0; i < winners.length; i++){ if(i !== 0) { winnerName = winnerName.concat(', ') winnerName = winnerName.concat(winners[i].name) } else winnerName = winnerName.concat(winners[i].name) } winnerName = winnerName.concat(' Wins') return(

{winnerName}

) } render() { const {winners} = this.props.cardTable return (

Cards

Enter Player Start

The Basics : Hand Ranking
1.  All Same : K, K, K     
2.  Straight : 10, 9, 8     
3.  Two of a Kind : 5, J, J    
4.  Highest Card : A, J, 2    
Note : Suits of a card doesn't matter {winners.length > 0 && (

Winner
{this.getWinnerName()}
)}
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return{ cardTable : state.cardTable, main : state.main } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Home)
